VUP 0 1 0
N 0 0 -1
#W wr wl wt wb
W 400 -400 300 -300
R 0 0 0
L 0 0 180 15000 15000 15000

L 250 0 -500 8000 8000 8000
#L 0 400 -160 15000 15000 15000
#L 0 -400 -160 15000 15000 15000

S 70 -50 -230 -100 255 0 0 0 1 0.2 0.2 0.8 1
